name: NoSQL Weekly
tag_list: newsletter, nosql, mongodb, couchdb, cassandra, bigtable, hadoop, simpledb, flockdb, redis
description: A Free, Weekly NoSQL E-mail Newsletter
overview:
NoSQL Weekly is a free weekly newsletter, which features curated news, articles, new releases, tools and libraries, events, jobs etc related to NoSQL. You can go here, http://www.nosqlweekly.com/ to subscribe to NoSQL Weekly - it’s a one click process.

We have also launched a job board for specifically for NoSQL and related technologies jobs. You can check it out here, http://jobs.nosqlweekly.com/
